If your english is average (like mine) then switch to your native language, it will help you understand the ending. Don't rush the game. Pay attention to all logs and dialogues. Try to realize the ending yourself, don't watch an explanation immediately.

Не только лучшая часть из всей серии, но и одна из лучших впринципе. Очень добратная шутер составляющая(которая как по мне улучшилась по сравнению с предыдущими частями), и самое главное - сюжет. Именно сюжет является главной частью этой игры, ведь даже после прохождения игры предаться его "перечитывать" в интернете дабы понять что где когда. Вердикт - 10 из 10.

整个游戏的故事是从“我”20年前的 布克 把我的女儿“安娜”卖给了“我”20年前因为愧疚卖掉了安娜而创立了天空之城的 “我”改名为康斯托克 买下了从“我” 20年前的布克手里的安娜并且改名为伊丽莎白。 “我” 20年前的布克因为后悔卖出“我”的女儿安娜追出寻找“我”的女儿“安娜”不仅没有成功救下还导致了“我” 布克的女儿“安娜”也就是20年后的“伊丽莎白”的小拇指缺失。“我”20年前的布克在飞艇上杀了“我”20年后的康斯托克，世界线收束产生悖论效果导致平行世界增多，“伊丽莎白”也就是“我”的女儿“安娜”必须将康斯托克在襁褓中溺死也就是溺死“我”布克。“我”为了“安娜”我的女儿能够幸福的活着，在一次主的洗礼中选择被溺死。
也就是说我竟是我自己。
你要杀谁？我要杀你！你是谁？我是我！我是你，你又是谁？我杀了你！是谁杀了我 而我又杀了谁？是我杀了我！！

Oynadığım en iyi atmosfere ve şehir tasarımına sahip oyunlardan biri. Atmosfer gerçekten nasıl bir ortamda olduğunuzu, halkın ne gibi bir psikolojide olduğunu polis ve iyi diyaloglara sahip konuşan robotlarla çok iyi yansıtıyor. Elizabeth hayatımda gördüğüm en iyi yan karakter olabilir. Shooter olarak da sırıtmıyor, fakat oynadığım en iyi shooter değil. Vigorlar özellikle de oyunun sonlarına doğru dakika başı kullan kullan diye dayatılıyor fakat hiçbir işe yaramıyor diyebilirim.

FPSにストーリーは求めない派なのだが、終盤の展開は非常に楽しめた。FPSのストーリーで鳥肌が立ったのは初めてかもしれない。
終盤までは「今のところよくある話だけど、どう収拾つけるんだろね？」くらいな印象ではあった。しかし、よくある話ではありつつも世界観に厚みを感じさせる造りこみ(NPCの会話やボイスレコーダー)が楽しく、続きを知りたい気持ちで最後まで進められた。

戦闘はサクサク進められるのが心地よく、純粋に雑魚敵を倒すだけでも楽しい。ただ、難易度自体は低く(※)歯ごたえを求めてプレイするゲームではない。
※ヘッドショットをきちんとできれば全ボス初見撃破可能なくらいの難易度

不満点としては、弾薬や隠し装備を探す部分に時間がかかりがちなところ。弾薬に関してはエリザベスが勝手に探して補給してくれるので、本来探す必要はない。しかしながら満タンになっていないと不安になることから、ついつい探して時間を無駄にしがち……

This is the first game i have ever reviewed.. when this game came out, i purchased it, played about 45 minutes, decided it wasn't for me, and sold it. i was wrong.

Now in 2020, i purchased it again because of a steam sale, and played it.. what an emotional roller-coaster - this story hit me right in the bean bag - an absolute beauty of a game - and if you try it, and think "this isn't really for me" - give it a chance - it will prove you wrong - what an absolute AAA experience of a game - 10/10.

BioShock Infinite è senza dubbio il capito più bello della saga sotto molti se non tutti i punti di vista, partendo dalla storia dal qualche possiamo capire che questo titolo è un prequel dell'intera saga, e non solo le vicende dei due personaggi principali arricchiscono l'universo di BioShock  grazie agli eventi che questi trascorrono i quali ci faranno legare ed immedesimare in loro, il gameplay è la logica evoluzione delle meccaniche di gioco dei precedenti capitoli ampliando le opzioni su come affrontare le sfide che ci vengono incontro.
BioShock Infinite è il migliore del suo genere e tra i più bei giochi di sempre, ne consiglio l'acquisto a tutti.

生化奇兵三部曲中最后一作，虽然说是最后一作，但其实剧情是在第一代之前的，可以说是第一代的前传。
本体是一部完全独立的作品，其剧情与系列前作完全没有关联，如果你想体验连续的剧情，我建议你将dlc和第一代一并购入，至于第二代其实意义不大。
该部作品之所以被称之为神作，我个人认为这是整个游戏中对于角色个性的塑造以及剧情内容走向两个部分共同起到的协同作用。若你不是一个能够适应慢节奏游戏的玩家，或者说你是一位只追求游戏性的玩家，那么我个人认为这部作品或者说这系列作品不太适合你。在我眼中，该系列作品可以说是完全的剧情向的游戏，也确实很符合我胃口。
我个人认为这部作品的魅力点在于其剧情内容以及节奏的把握上都十分恰到好处，故事会以玩家完全预测不见的方向发展。另一方面，略微烧脑的结局会带给玩家意犹未尽的感觉，甚至会产生玩家想再通关二周目以便更好了解这个世界的冲动。如果你的时间充足，个人建议你通关一周目后结合着网上各路玩家的剧情解析再去通关二周目，这会让你更加深入以及更加全面地理解该部作品。
在通关了本体的基础上，如果你还想更加深入了解该系列作品，那么一定要将dlc的两部作品通关，因为它们是和第一部作品起着衔接作用的部分。但若你失去了兴趣的话，浅尝辄止体验原作也就够了，因为dlc的内容和画风与本作差距很大，可能会令某些玩家感到不适（因为太虐了，我说实话），而且很有可能你原作还没理解的情况下再玩dlc会让你头上产生更多的问号。
Una obra maestra

Bioshock is one of my favorite franchises in gaming history. The narrative, atmosphere, and gameplay elements all are amazing, and I feel that Bioshock Infinite takes the cake in those three categories. Elizabeth and Booker are both great characters to learn about and watch develop; the story, while convoluted and crazy, I enjoy very much; and the gameplay is just fun, especially on PC (using a mouse and keyboard compared to a controller is pretty lit). I hope that more comes from this franchise in the future.

Currently only 9 hours in.
I played for 5 hours straight when I first booted the game. 
Extremely immersive, amazing soundtrack, graphics are astonishingly ahead of its time and gorgeous. 
Story line is wildly gripping, intense, and cleverly written.
This game truly keeps me on the edge of my seat around every corner.
Catch it on sale, or buy it full price, either way I highly doubt you will regret it.

fun

Absolutely an unsurpassable masterpiece. I definitely will not, and can not forget the story of this game for at least 10 years, literally. It shocked me from the bottom of my heart, from the deep inside human beings, from the question round the power of evil & sin in philosophy.

The story and music is just extremely excellent like I already mentioned, in addition if you are a person who love philosophy and always think about connected questions then it will be unforgettable for you, just like me.

On the other hand, the graphic and views in the game also amazing, even wonderful if you know it released on 2013. For the gameplay, it is a single narrative FPS game so what you actually need to do is just follow the mark and use both of your magics and weapons to shoot down enemies. There are no puzzles and no side stories, just enjoy playing. The level of difficulty can be selected, so it almost would not have challenges if you just want the story meanwhile also would have if you with high difficult level. From my point of view, shooting experiences were actually fun especially with some hidden clues about the main story. But to be honest it is not a superb FPS game if you are just looking for good shooting experiences.

In conclusion, it is a masterpiece for anyone who are looking for a great single play experience. There is no threshold for the whole gameplay (especially, there are NO PUZZLES! Fuck doom eternal by the way) so just enjoy your journey to Columbia!
great game, played the other bioshocks but this one of my favs

[h1][u][b] "Perception without comprehension is a dangerous combination" [/b][/u][/h1]

Going through this game and finishing it after playing Cyberpunk struck a chord with me, it might be a coincidence or I was really meant to play this game now. These two games have something in common, a false promise so to speak but another version we didn't know we wanted. Both had versions before release that were so imaginative and bold that it were games that we truly wanted to play but in the end we got something else. I can go on how these two games seem so 'alike', but the this quote above seals the main goal this game was set on achieving and unlike Cyberpunk this game succeeds on its delivery. "Perception without comprehension is a dangerous combination" you might say that the game is speaking on behalf of its story but in reality its also speaking towards the cautionary tale of an 'overhyped game', a bloated concept can lead to any downfall and that's where the story of this game's development flourishes. 'Irrational Games' understood how much they can push and how much they can deliver, and they translated that into a well-woven story that will keep us thinking for years to come. I can only say that this game's ending further solidifies that fact, a story that pushed beyond standard story telling yet placing in boundaries that it understood. 

And in the end all I could say is "Wow..."
because "wow" is an all purpose exclamation, it can mean you loved it or you can't put into other words how much you did love it. Its up to you, and that's what Irrational Games wanted to do 8 years ago. They couldn't put into words how much this game or this story meant to them so they wanted to place it into a game, to reflect the struggle they had behind the scenes and prove that they can pull something this amazing off. This game either meant to the developers as their Story-Rich FPS or their love-letter to the gaming industry as a whole and how much this industry means to them and how much they proved that no concept is impossible when set the right boundaries. Irrational Games has made me rethink on how [b]'Infinite'[/b] our imaginations can take us.
Oyunun mekan tasarımları tek kelimeyle muhteşem. Hikayesi falan da baya iyi. Güzel vakit geçirip iyi bir hikaye deneyimlemek için ideal bir oyun.

Bioshock Infinite got a lot of hate when it first came out because if was not the Bioshock that fans came to know and love. But this was a risk the developers took to expand the world and extend it's scope outside of Rapture. Some think that attempt failed, but I disagree. This is worth a play if you're a fan of the series.
